content: use vibrant folk colours or traditional christmas shades to make these bright and cheerful crochet baubles plenty of texture for extra flair and you have crochet decorations to adorn your tree that you will be proud of written in us crochet terms **measurements** each bauble measures 3in 7 5cm in circumference gauge is not important for this project **materials** small amounts of 4 ply/ sports weight cotton yarn in various colours examples would be yarn and colors must have scheepjes catona 2 5mm crochet hook yarn needle to weave in threads and sew your bauble scissors christmas bauble approx 3in 7 5cm in diameter use some from last years decorations you can find a free version on my blog
